#summary compile FOTA and sync with SVN repo

1. install update http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x

2. update/chekout from repo

3. project propities->Build->

3.1 Builder Settings->Use default build command: path\FASMARM.EXE ${selected_resource_loc}

3.2 Behaviour->Build: remove "all"

4. Run External Tool Config->Location: path\MultiLoaderX_v5.65.exe
